replacementTextForUniques: Если что сюда пишется что будет отображаться вместо uniques

name: Landowning reforms (Maria Theresa)
replacementTextForUniques:
+1 [Food], +1 [Gold] from every Farm in Bonus resource tiles
//  +1 [Food], +1 [Gold] from every Plantation in Citrus/Sugar/Wine/Spices tiles
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Gold] from every [Farm] <in [Bonus resource] tiles>

name: King of the Habsburgs (Otakar II)
replacementTextForUniques:
Earn 100% of killed Military unit's Strength as [Faith] in Friendly Land tiles (+150% during the Medieval era)
//  Gain 50 [Faith] upon conquering a city (+50 Faith additionally for built Shrine and Temple in cities)
uniques: Earn [100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Faith] <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles> <starting from the [Ancient era]> <before the [Medieval era]>
Earn [150]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Faith] <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Medieval era]>
Earn [100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Faith] <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles> <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
Gain [50] [Faith] <upon conquering a city> <in cities with a [Shrine]>
Gain [50] [Faith] <upon conquering a city> <in cities with a [Temple]>
